ComicInfo.Summary:
The Countdown to 100 begins! Still reeling from the events of last issue Sela struggles to cope with the revelation that the man she thought she loved is a Highborn villain. Confronting him only makes matters worse and she is torn and confused on whether she should fight him or join him on his mission to cure humanity of its penchant for greed and violence.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Pasquale Qualano & Ylenia Di Napoli | 1 | B | Cover B | Emilio Laiso & Alessia Nocera | 2 | C | Cover C | Vincenzo Cucca & Sanju Nivangune | 3 | Exc | Zenescope Exclusive Cover, Limited to 500 | Talent Caldwell | 4 |
